name: Blazing Duel
description:
Trijam #79 late submission.
Theme: "If you play with fire you'll get burned"

Notice: there is no browser version due to physics bug (game colissions are pixel related and have issues in WebGL version)

Classic Worms-like 2P game with destructable terrain.
Whatch cast force indicators while casting fireballs. You'll fail if you release cast too soon or too late.

You can customize players hit points, rounds amount and time for each turn in seconds.

Controls

Move LeftA, Arrow LeftMove RightD, Arrow RightAim UPW, Arrow UPAim DownS, Arrow DownJumpSpacebar, Circle Cast SpellF, Cross
